text: right Nanny Ogg's Cookbook is a recipe book written from the in-world perspective of Discworld character Nanny Ogg. Nanny Ogg's Cookbook was written by Terry Pratchett, Stephen Briggs and Tina Hannan, and illustrated by Paul Kidby. ==External links== * Category:Discworld books Category:Cookbooks Category:1999 books
title: Nanny Ogg's Cookbook
